description:
The revived demon Zardius is so powerful that not even Matthias can stop him. Alma and Lurie head for the castle treasury to retrieve a sword that might do the trick... but will a demon resurgence make that impossible?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le sage suprême reprend la route
The Strongest Sage Goes On a Journey Again.
最強賢者, 再び旅立つ.
